CustomField.formula: IF (AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Authoring"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Filing")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"In Clause Approval"))), IF(OR($User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4d', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4t', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4u'), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__LightningSelectTemplate?id=" &Id & "&action=Regenerate_Agreement&templateType=Agreement", IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_Regenerate", "Regenerate"), "_self"), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__SelectTemplate?id=" &Id & "&action=Regenerate_Agreement&templateType=Agreement", IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_Regenerate", "Regenerate"), "_self")), NULL)
CustomField.label: Regenerate
